This is a a rather famous shop in Indra Chow. They just offer one thing, a delicious lassi that's not too sweet, topped with a dollop of cheesy crumble and a few nuts and raisins. You can get it small (Rs 55 in Oct 2023) or large (Rs 100). My aunt introduced me to it in 2010 and I had to pay a visit when I returned to Kathmandu in 2023. It's that memorable.

This used to be my favorite place for lassi in indrachowk but recently they started adding A LOT of ice to their lassi making it too runny. The khuwa also tastes bad. They changed their location from October 17th and started using plastic cups instead of their usual glass which was also kinda disappointing. The quality and authenticity of Janakpur lassi bhandar has terribly reduced.

This might be the best lassi in Kathmandu! The shop is simple: they sell a small cup for 55rps or a large cup for 100rps. The lassi itself is not overly thick and is sweetened with sugar or perhaps honey. They also add in some raisins, cashews and some kind of soft pudding (only for the large cup). It's so good that I will be going back for more before I leave

Indrachowk is famous for lassi right below Aakash Bhairav. But Janakpur Lassi Bhandar, inside an alley next to the chowk, serves the lassi best in taste with enough nuts, khowa, hint of rose flavour and perfect creaminess.  At present, the roadway in the alley is disrupted and some construction work is going on. They have currently shifted to the new place which is a few meters ahead, next to Global IME Bank. There is always a man in the old shop to give you the direction of the new relocation. Overall, I would go here over and over.
Best lassi in the town.
Best Lassi in town!!!!
Wow #nice #mittho lssii
Very nice and refreshing drink!! Fresh make and not too sweet.

Step aside, other lassi joints! This place is the OG trendsetter in the vicinity. They probably invented lassi before cows even knew they could produce milk! And boy, does it show in the taste! Their lassi is like a sweet, creamy dream that'll make you question your existence. Plus, they serve it in actual glasses - not those flimsy plastic cups other places use, 'cause they seem to care about the environment and your drinking experience. So, if you want a lassi that's as legendary as the disco era, head straight to this spot and let your taste buds party like it's 1980.

One of the best Lassi's I have ever had. There are lots of other sellers with lassi around the junction but this one tastes the best from the rest. It is priced higher at Rs 55 for small and 100 for a large glass compared to other sellers selling at Rs 45-50 for small glass. There's a hint of saffron in the lassi with dry fruits too. I always have a small glass every time I go by the area.

We visited this cafe today and found it very busy, with all tables occupied. We managed to find a seat, but the overall experience was disappointing. The staff seemed unfriendly and overwhelmed, showing little attention to service. The coffee was just okay--nothing more--and it was served lukewarm. We asked for brown sugar, which was not brought to our table; it was simply placed near the staff without informing us, and I only noticed it by chance. At one point, we accidentally spilled some water and asked for help, but no one came.

Another issue was the smoke--although smoking is allowed only at the outside tables, the smoke drifts straight inside through the open windows, making it unpleasant for those seated indoors.

The cafe is clearly understaffed for the number of guests, and management should seriously consider hiring more people, especially during peak hours. Unfortunately, I won't be returning.

Best coffee in Kathmandu!! The owners are so friendly and welcoming and really care about the customers and the coffee. We had coffee here at least twice a day while staying in Kathmandu (We recommend the brownie:))

That said, don't bother ordering certain drinks if the manager is making them as even after being a loyal customer for months he'll water down your juice to bank the extra saving which is about as low as it gets...

This has to be the nicest Cafe of Kathmandu, i certainly couldn't find a better one during my stay. It's a beautiful and quiet place with nice staff and good food. You have to try the blueberry cheesecake, its amazing.

Great place to start your day. Their oat milk matcha latte is the best in Thamel. The green salad and oat porridge are very good. The place accepts credit cards and fonepay, in addition to cash. The staff is very attentive, carrying, friendly, and efficient. More importantly, the place has a very pleasant vibe that made me feel always welcomed.

Very nice and cozy cafe. We had once  breakfast and once lunch here, and we can only recommend it. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. I still remember my experience which was during the nepali new year's day. Very memorable indeed because we had to dine infront of the RESTROOM. Mind you, I had made reservations 2 days prior and noted the services would be available for me(+1) at our requested time but when we arrived the staffs were just negligently placing us where ever they found soothing. I'm writing this today because I passed by that restaurant today like most times and I don't want to be haunted by the disrespectful service I received whenever I pass by.
Amazing food served by sailesh,hospitality was amazing well mannered polite.Food was amazing will visit soon  Cheers to life
One of the best dine-in spots in Kathmandu. The interior is inviting, the staff are warm and welcoming, and the food is simply good and flavorful. A wonderful experience overall

The food was exceptional other than the tandoori chicken which was raw within.  Subsequently, we had ordered a few coconut water and the noise created from the lads  preparing it was annoying.  Besides this, our experience in entirety was exceptional and the service second to none

The restaurant offered a delightful experience with both great food and a warm atmosphere. The dishes were tasty, fresh, and nicely presented. fancy place , a bit pricy, food lack of consistency, don't match with price and portion. Parking problem , runout many dishes

Definitely get the Truffle Chicken and Prawn A La Crevette. Service is impeccable. We had a wonderful time.

From the very first glance, the dishes served were a visual treat beautifully plated with vibrant colors and fresh garnishes. The grilled pieces, likely tandoori-style, were rich in smoky char and flavor, complemented perfectly by the green herb chutney base that added a refreshing contrast. A feast for both the eyes and the palate. Highly recommended for those who appreciate flavor-packed dishes with a gourmet presentation twist.
Heaven for Indian cuisine! Everything that we tried was amazing! Must visit!
One of the best spots in town! The food was amazing, and Chef Ajay Dai was really humble and friendly to everyone.
The ambinance and food was brilliant and superb taste.Thanks to our Fantastic chef dai for delicious food and again thanks to the dining family for best hospitality.

One of the Finest Dining Experiences in Kathmandu

Dining here was truly exceptional. Chef Ajay is nothing short of a magician with his culinary artistry. We asked him to choose the menu for us, and he amazed us dish after dish. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian selections were outstanding -- full of flavor, creativity, and finesse.

The ambiance, service, and attention to detail made it a complete fine dining experience. Easily one of the must-visit places in Kathmandu if you're looking to indulge in top-tier cuisine.
Good one
BEST FOOD IN THE TOWN. MUST TRY!!!! GOOD FOOD,SERVICE AND ATMOSPHERE 10/10

Blown away by Dining room by Chef Ajay! From the moment we stepped in, the ambiance was just chef's kiss - truly setting the perfect mood. But what truly made our evening unforgettable was the spectacular hospitality; every staff member went above and beyond. The food was nothing short of magnificent. Each dish was a culinary masterpiece. A must visit place!!

We were a group of 4, and I, a lifelong vegetarian, specifically ordered veg jhol momo. After 30 minutes, the momo arrived. I took one bite, and was horrified to realize it was chicken.

We called the waiter, who casually admitted it was a mix-up. No apology, no accountability , just pure negligence. My veg momo was delivered to another table upstairs.

This is completely unacceptable, especially from a so-called reputed restaurant. For vegetarians, this isn't just a mistake,  it's offensive and traumatic. If your staff can't get basic orders right, you have no business serving food.

I'm never coming back. This "Mixup by Ajay" has me thinking twice before dining outdoors.
Tasted few items all good except biryani.

Such a nice place to have dinner with family and friends. The ambience is so great and the staffs are so friendly. This is a must visit if your looking to satisfy your palate with best Indian food in town.
Nice food and good service..

Ovr, I had a pleasant and fascinating experience/vibes at Dinning Room by chef Ajays. The food was spectacular ranging from its delicate cheese balls to marvelous Indian dishes packed with tons of  flavors. Definitely a must try!

A Truly Delightful Experience at Dining Room by Chef Ajay

From the moment we stepped in, Dining Room by Chef Ajay impressed us with its warm and elegant ambience. The interior is beautifully designed -- modern yet cozy -- making it a perfect setting for a relaxed and enjoyable meal.

But what truly stood out was the food. Every dish we tried was full of flavor, cooked to perfection, and presented with care. It's clear that Chef Ajay puts his heart into every plate. The balance of spices and textures made the meal truly memorable.

Highly recommend this place if you're looking for a quality dining experience with excellent service and a stunning atmosphere. Definitely coming back soon!

This one is much hyped. I have been there today , it's Monday , and the service is too poor. Basically this place is for Indian people and Indian food as far as I know but the service and the indoor sittings here is pathetic. Prices are a bit high, you cannot get whatever you wish to have.They have big menu but not all the items you choose are available.

The people who serve food are not friendly and you have to put your effort in order to get your food on time otherwise it's completely mess. Once is enough for this place. Big NO to repeat .
Extremely slow service. Lack of staff.

A nice place with good ambience. Food is different though nice. Very conveniently located right along the road from Bhatbhateni leading to baluwatar. They have indoor as well as terrace seating. The only drawback seems to be the limited parking.
One of the slowest service ever I have experienced

I just went to Restaurant and it was pretty good! The vibe was super chill, like you could go for a quick lunch or hang out for a while over dinner.

Not too fancy, not too casual - just right. The staff was on the ball, always there when you needed 'em but not hovering, which is nice. And the food? Solid.

Nothing that'll blow your mind, but everything tasted fresh and well-made.

Definitely felt like I got my money's worth. If you're looking for a dependable spot for a good meal, you can't really go wrong with Restaurant.
THIS RESTAURANT IS OUTSTANDING IN EVERY WAY. THE FOOD IS DELICIOUS, THE INTERIOR IS BEAUTIFUL DESIGNED, AND THE SERVICE IS EXCELLENT. A GREAT PLACE TO ENJOY A FANTASTIC DINING EXPERIENCE

Never in my life ever I had to step out of a restaurant because the food was served too late. A plate of momo was all that I ordered because I was hungry and eating solo. Imagine the food not being served for almost 45 minutes and no one coming in between to check with you. They told me they mistakenly served my order to some other table. What a horrible experience I had with this restaurant.

Very amazing space for unique food taste with amazing ambience. I enjoyed different varieties with lovely taste. Most recommend place to visit if you are in Kathmandu and want to taste wonderful  taste. I had few amazing tastes of unique food

truly lives up to its name -- it was absolutely amazing! The food was not only delicious but also fresh and well-balanced. Each dish had a rich, authentic taste that left a lasting impression.

The service was even more impressive -- the staff were friendly, attentive, and genuinely warm. Their respectful behavior and prompt service made the dining experience even more enjoyable...

Had a great time at harding`s last time went there for a small  nerworking event fof 20 and thay were very accmmodating .it was perfect .huge thank you to yubraj the rest of the staff .I highly recmmend harding"s for your next get tougehter.
Evert aspect of our stay exceeded our expectations.great staff most comfortable table ever amazing location.bar makes amazing martinis and restaurant makes a lovely food .
Very bad service
Very poor service. The waiter does not come to check on you while you're having food
Very poor service

Went with family of 8, for my birthday dinner and was very excited for it since I'd heard such good things. The food was good, it didn't feel overly oily or over spiced like most Indian restaurants in Kathmandu. However, the service of the restaurant wasn't to my liking. The waiters lacked warmth and a welcoming attitude. One waitress (probably her name is Jeny) literally snatched the plate from my hands. I understand that after whole day of work, it can be frustrating but last thing you want to do is be rude to your customers. The restaurant got really busy an hour after our arrival so I get it but, the facility lacked the ability to manage the orders. Everything arrived super late. The food was good and lived up to the expectation, however, Chef Ajay should really look into the management. Its not only the taste but the experience that people leave your restaurant with.
Food was good service was good but space & hookah wasn't good. Its too hot outside as its way too open

Excellent food and drinks; loved the biryani, naan and chicken masala. Who knew brocolli could taste that good, a must have appetiser.
Service delivery does need improvement.
Yummy food and pleasant atmosphere with excellent service.
Ambience was good and service is excellent also food was tooooo good

Visit again every things is amazing
Everyone visit once in a life

Firstly, parking presents a significant challenge.  The prawn dish lacked lemon, the sizzler was missing its sauce, and the mutton momo was spoiled.  Furthermore, the waiter prematurely removed the momo sauce.

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dining Room By Chef Ajay, and I must say it was nothing short of spectacular. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and a cozy ambiance that immediately made me feel at home.

The menu boasted an impressive variety of dishes, each one thoughtfully crafted. I opted for Chicken Tikka and Prawn chilly, and every bite was an explosion of flavor. The freshness of the ingredients and the attention to detail in presentation truly stood out. It's evident that the chefs take immense pride in their work.

The service was impeccable--attentive without being intrusive, and the staff went out of their way to ensure every aspect of our meal was perfect.

Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply looking for a place to unwind with exceptional food, Dining Room is the place to be. I will definitely be returning and recommending it to everyone I know!

Known Chef Ajay for some few years ... Awesome chef , His Indian food preps are all really good. Recently visited his new restaurant. The ambience was really nice.. Comfortable seats and the decor was very nice ..High ceilings, well stocked and decorated bar...open kitchen. The staff were very professional. Toilets were very clean and loved the separate hand washing areas... We had variety of snacks which were lip smacking good and for mains we had mutton and butter chicken and Dal makhani with garlic naan and rice . Especially the prawns as starters was nice. Large big screen to watch IPL. Parking has limited space though. Keep up the good work Ajay chef ...we could see ur hard work through the windows and attending to every order personally once it left the kitchen... Consistency is the key...

An outstanding dining experience in Nepal! This premium restaurant offers a perfect blend of authentic Indian flavors and exquisite seafood dishes. Every dish is crafted with perfection, using high-quality ingredients and bold spices that truly elevate the flavors. The ambiance is elegant, the service is warm and attentive, and the presentation is impeccable.

There was a slight delay in delivering the order to the table, but the exceptional taste and quality of the food made it well worth the wait. A must-visit for food lovers seeking a luxurious culinary journey!

After hearing so much praise about this restaurant, we decided to visit for a friend's birthday, and it was truly an unforgettable experience. The ambiance was perfect--luxurious yet welcoming--and set the stage for an incredible meal. The food was absolutely exquisite, each dish a masterpiece that reflected the chef's extraordinary talent. Every bite was bursting with flavor, showcasing a level of craftsmanship that's second to none. The service was impeccable, with staff going above and beyond to make the evening special. It was the perfect way to celebrate, and we can't wait to return.

The food was horrible, service even worse. It is not a fine dining place at all!! The servers knew nothing about the food and wine they were serving and had no service etiquette, something as basic as checking if there is proper cutlery in the table. The food had nothing to boast about the chef! The only good thing about this place was the location and the interior or the place, may be the toilet. Rest - was pure disappointment!

Came to this restaurant multiple times. Food is good but service chai is bad on friday nights. We asked for heater almost 5 times, nothing. We waited for water for 20 minutes. Still nothing. One of the waiter was pretty rude, others weren't. Plus too much salt on one of the dishes we ordered. Won't come here again.
The ambiance was excellent.  The food and beverages were superb. Sujan provided exceptional service.
amazing food great ambience. highly recommended!!!
Best food prime location and friendly Staffs.
Very good place and food

I had an excellent dining experience at Dining by Chef Ajay. Everything about this restaurant was top-notch--from the ambiance to the food and service. The dishes were exceptionally well-prepared, full of flavor, and beautifully presented.
A special mention goes to our waiter, Sailesh Lama, who made the experience even better. He was extremely polite, attentive, and ensured that we had everything we needed. His professionalism and friendly nature truly stood out.
It's such a fine dining place and the best thing is their food. Food is beyond amazing. Wonderful experience!!
I was very satisfied, near the center yet very calm at night, for the record that was 2 years ago and I still remember the experience like it was yesterday.

The property is average only. But few staffs from restaurant and room service were great. Located inside the market. Doves will be there at your windows, they will make noise so you won't be able to sleep properly. Breakfast is below average only. Promised a wake up call for my early morning flight but I had to wake up the receptionist for my check out. I stayed at a room without balcony. Trust me there is no such view from the balcony rooms. So go there with average expectations.

I have stayed at a dozen hotels in Kathmandu Thamel area.This was on the top of the list of best stays/experiences ever. The friendly and helpful staff were there for every need of mine. Thank you so much.

I recently stayed at this hotel in Thamel market, and I couldn't have asked for a better experience! The location is absolutely perfect, right in the heart of the vibrant Thamel area. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, always ready to assist with a smile.

The vibes are fantastic; the atmosphere is both calm and peaceful, making it a great retreat after a day of exploring. Plus, the hotel is neat and clean, which is always a top priority for me.

I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a pleasant stay in Kathmandu!
Heaven, palace, excellent

Great place to stay in Kathmandu, staff is very friendly and really keen to make our stay enjoyable. Location is close to central, quiet area, room is very big, nice concept, bathroom is clean and well equipped. Breakfast is exceptional, various options, both nepalese and continental dishes. Excellent value for money.
Best hotel and the best staff in the thamel area. Hotel specialy for family
Durbar as your place really as Palace thanks for your great service

One of the best hotel and near my favorite leading company great vision trek and expedition pvt Ltd.
so thanks dipak sir for your best service we have been enjoying as palace.
Thanks for your service you are amazing
As king palace we have been enjoying thanks Deepak sir
As like Durbar and best facility thanks Dipak sir
Facility and service wise, it should be a two star hotel. Not recommended and not going back again for sure.
Excellent
I am Mr . Ghias uddin  , i going  to Singapore to  Nepal stay Dom Himalayan  Hotel.  This  Hotel very good  ,Nice place  ,Net and clean ,all staff is frindly  almost  good  ,Highly Recommended.
Highly recommended. The staff is excellent. Especially Sawal and Prashansa. Great location. Staff will help in any way you need. Kitchen and spa are top notch.

My favourite hotel I've stayed in Kathmandu. Kind staff who's always willing to help and answer questions. Great services and breakfast. Also rooms were beautiful and clean. Couldn't have asked for more.
Excellent stay - as always !
Such a nice place to stay! The have a beautiful garden where you can have your breakfast. The food is tasty and the service is nice

Incredible service from the prompt airport pickup to the amazingly extensive breakfast to the location and the rooms with patios and the VERY friendly staff. I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else but here now in Kathmandu

Hotel du debut de sejour et de fin
Spacieux belle chambre

Super emplacement
Bon rapport qualite prix
Ideal pour demarrer un Trekk
prathabaicchmaakkha

Sehr zentral gelegen in Kathmandu. Das Personal ist super freundlich und serviceorientiert. Zur Begrussung gab es ein Getrank. Zimmer werden jeden Tag gereinigt. Westliche Toiletten sind vorhanden sowie AirCondition. Essen im Hotel ist sehr gut. Spa-Angebote gibt es auch (Massage, Gesichtsreinigung, Manikure, etc.....)
Nice place to stay
I stayed in the Dom Himalaya and recommend the hotel for it's excellent atmosphere and friendly staff. The breakfast buffet is definitely a bonus!
A clean and beautiful place with great food  and good staff.

good location, excellent hospitality with all necessary amenities. Generous staff. looked after basic needs and helped making my tour pleasant.
Great rooms , nice eatery,  a beautiful view from the room balcony.
location is also close to nearby tourist attractions. Helped in providing transportation also
Thanks for the hospitality

jeonjaengteo gateun tamel georieseo naege neomu joheun hyusigeul seonsahan domhimalraya hotel.
hotel ibgureul jina bange deuleoomyeon tamelgeoriyi siggeureoun otobaiwa casoriga danjeol doel mankeum joyongham.
deogbune jameul pug jal su isseosseum.
hotel jeonbanjeogeuro wisaengsaengtaedo nabbeuji anhasseumyeon josigdo gaeinjeogeuro manjog seureoweosseum.
rumseobiseureul iyonghae bojin anhassjiman gagyeogi bissaji anhasseum.
elrebeiteodo isseo jim olmgigiedo bulpyeonhami eobseumyeon 1ceunggwa 5ceunge teraseudo isseo joyonghage maegjuhanjan hagi joheum.
waipai jal teojigo jigweonbundeuldo gogaegeungdaedo johgo cinjeolhaesseumyeo kateumandue dasi ondamyeon jaebangmunhagesseum.
Good
Staff molto gentile, camera nel complesso buona, servizi gestiti bene e Momo buonissimi!!

Staff were great, very attentive and helpful.  Hotel is very nice (for a budget hotel), but my room could use some work -- 2 of 3 room electricity outlets were broken, and the bathroom light did not work (so difficult to see while shaving).  Free breakfast was good (buffet with many selections).  A nice courtyard for eating.  My room had no fridge, contrary to what the website said.

Overall, I enjoyed my stay.

Really enjoyed my stay here this week.  Staff was absolutely outstanding; friendly and helpful.  Room was cozy and warmly decorated.  Outdoor courtyard area is pretty and peaceful; nice place place to relax with a beverage.  I almost exclusively walked places during my stay and found the location convenient.  Only minor complaints were that the bed was a little too firm for my taste, and room could use a little more lighting.
Good service  and  regional price
Very nice services loved it
Affordable price and good management I like it

nepale omyeon neul bangmunhabnida. ibeoni nebeonjjae ibnida. ibgug culgugsi haruna iteul sugbaghaneunde neul ggalggeumhago joheunseobiseureul jegonghabnida. hanggongpyeon ddaemune  jom neujge cekeuaushage doelddaedo jal dowajubnida.hotele issneun seupayi masajido johseubnida.jeoneun aroma badabwassneunde  teurekeomasajineun mal geudaero teurekinghu puleojuneungeora jom apeunde aromaneun pyeonhago johnaeyo.daeume teurekinghue omyeon teureking masajido hanbeon badabogo sipnaeyo

I always visit here when I come to Nepal. This is my fourth time. I stay here for one or two days when I enter or leave the country, and they always provide clean and good service. They help me a lot even when I have to check out late because of my flight. The massage at the spa in the hotel is also good. I tried the aroma massage, and the trekker massage is literally a relaxation after trekking, so it is a bit painful, but the aroma massage is comfortable and good. Next time I come after trekking, I want to try the trekking massage.
Good
One of the best hotel in kathmandu thamel warm hospitality i love This place
This hotel is in an excellent location and walkable, it is quiet, the staff is friendly and helpful, the breakfast is excellent with a variety of options
Cest le meilleur en nepal
Great hotel at a very reasonable price. Breakfast was great.

We had a great time at the hotel with excellent service and a nice buffet. It's an established hotel with proper setup. It has one Indian dish in the morning buffet everyday. They provide complementary airport pick-up facility also.
Mr. Mandip and Mr. Sujay have been very helpful for every requirement.
Thanks alot to the whole team.

Horrible experience. We booked the room for 20 days. Paid advance for1 night. The next day when reached to the hotel, receptionist informed that the room which we paid for was already taken. We had no choice but to stay for atleast a day. Room bedsheets were not clean. Requested for hot water, they said the technician is already gone so tomorrow.
Later at night we ordered burger, it was too cold. When Requested to heat it up, the chef Tekraj  from inside was shouting with the waiter stating that ( FROM WHERE THIS GUEST CAME, VILLAGERS. THEY HAVE NEVER EATEN THE BURGER BEFORE. I WILL NOT HEAT IT.) But the waiter Keshav insisted in a polite way then the chef heated the burger.
Very bad experience.

Had a great stay at Dom Himalayan Hotel in Thamel! The location is perfect--right in the heart of Thamel and close to party spots, but still quiet and peaceful. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the staff were super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was tasty with good options. Would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Kathmandu!!
Hotel bien place.

Super hotel. Byli jsme zde ubytovani pred a po nasi expedici Mera peak 6476m. Krasne pokoje, pohodlna postel. Snidane byla vynikajici, opravdu jsme si pochutnali. Je to v centru Thamelu - idealni poloha. Hotel se nachazi v klidne lokalite.
Super emplacement pour un hotel tres agreable. Un joli jardin attenant pour y manger grace a deux restaurants. Je recommande a 100% !!
Spacious rooms. Very nice and cooperative staff.  Good food and morning breakfast. Centrally located. Nearby good shopping centers
Nagyon kedvesek!

This hotel is one of the best hotels in the Thamel area. Neat and clean big room. Great location. Room service is a little bit slow but staff behaviour is very good. A little bit disappointed for their buffet breakfast. Very limited item and most of the items are tasteless. I think this is the only hotel in the Thamel area with a lift facility. So, this hotel can be a good choice for those visiting Kathmandu who want to stay in a luxurious hotel in a quiet environment with lift facilities.

I booked this place awhile back for my dad. He enjoyed the room facilities and the front-desk hospitality. However, a taxi driver assigned to pick up my unsuspecting and exhausted dad from the airport asked money from him for the ride although it was covered in the advance booking. I advise the hotel to take measures to curb unscrupulous petty scams and miscommunication between the systems/ staff that prevent customers from revisiting.

Small inn/hotel nestled in Thamel street. Good home vibe and convenient location.

Stayed here 1 night on the 14th of Sep before heading off for our EBC trek. Overall a decent hotel for an affordable price, the room and beds were clean and I really liked the sitting area just outside the entrance of the hotel! Didn't interacted much with the hotel staff but they all seemed very nice! Very close proximity to many trekking shops which was perfect for us as well!

I do have to point out that there were workers painting the outside of our window/balcony during our stay and when we were napping in our room, one of them kept knocking on the window and when I went to check what he wanted, he asked whether if we could unlock the balcony door and let him in our room so he could go down from the inside of the hotel so he could "save time" instead of going down from the outside of the balcony??? Quite odd and I was a little annoyed as I was napping and he wouldn't seem like he would stop knocking unless I checked what he wanted.

Perfect
Everybody is very friendly, like Niki and others

Exceptionally attentive and non-intrusive staff providing professional service. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Breakfast always had a huge variety to cover all kinds of palates and it full of value. The hotel is recessed into an alley and that is big plus - it is shielded from hustle and bustle of central Thamel, yet you have access to anything you need.

Located in thamel itself, it's uniquely located for you to walk to attractions in thamel or to get rides get around town. Hotel itself has a quiet charm in the busy thamel street outside with room service from the inhouse restaurant n even a massage center. The hotel itself gave complimentary morning breakfasts in buffet style during my stay with calls to remind us that we might miss out on the last service n gentle reminders on check out time - where they obliged me with a late check out too. Among the services I enjoyed were them helping me with arranged a ride to the airport on my app as well as bell boy service. They accept master n visa card on top booking via Agoda. Great location, nice charm n hearty meals

Hotel owner is very nice person
& staff has good behaviour
My experience of this Hostel Fantastic. Dinesh was a brilliant host and I will highly recommend it. I would highly recommend
Good hostel. Stuff is very helpful.

Everything is amazing about this place, clean, affordable, friendly, and the staff is amazing! The 2 friendliest workers are the receptionists, Munal and Sushmita helped me out a lot, I stayed here for 1 month and if I ever come back to Nepal, I will definitely stay here again

I came here as a solo female traveler and I'm SO happy I did. Everyone who stayed here was so friendly and felt like home very quickly. The location is so close to the shopping area and local restaurants I never had to get a taxi! The food at the hostel is wonderful, and the staff is great! This is by far one of my favorite hostels I've been to and would book again if I ever find myself back!

I stayed at Wonder Thirst Hostel and had a really good experience. The staff was friendly and helpful, and the atmosphere was perfect for meeting fellow travelers. The rooms and common areas were clean and well-maintained.

One of the best parts was the balcony view - you can see the streets, local life, and even some of the nearby hills from there. It's a great spot to relax in the evening and soak in the vibe of the city.

The location is also convenient, close to Thamel and public transport. Amenities like hot showers and Wi-Fi worked well.

Only minor issue was that it could get a bit noisy at night, but that's common in busy areas.

Overall, a solid choice for budget travelers and backpackers. I'd definitely recommend it!
Great experience staying here. Lovely atmosphere. Helpful staff. I would definitely recommend and stay again in the future.
Restaurant was good. The hostel was great. Rooms are clean and staff is excellent. Munal was very helpful.
Last day we have visited the Wander Thirst. There we did Dinner as well as spend the beautiful peaceful time with get-together with friends.  Very nice place to hang on and feel peaceful energy.

Das beste Hostel in Kathmandu, Preislich top,Sauberkeit top,Essen top und alle Mitarbeiter sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir konnten ohne Probleme fur den selben Preis verlangern. Es gibt 24 Stunden Security und die Tore werden ab 22 Uhr geschlossen. Auch sehr fur Radreisende zu empfehlen, wir sind selber von Deutschland bis hier hin mit dem Fahrrad gekommen.
It was nice to be a part in this hostel with lots of fun and pleasure

The hostel itself is a vibrant and welcoming space, perfect for backpackers, digital nomads, and solo travelers. The rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable, and the common areas are thoughtfully designed to encourage interaction while also allowing space for quiet relaxation. The rooftop offers a great view of the city, especially at sunset.

What truly sets WanderThirst apart, though, is the atmosphere. The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful--always ready to offer local tips or help you book activities. There's a real sense of community here, with regular events and a social vibe that doesn't feel forced.

The Garden Restaurant is a hidden gem. Set in a peaceful courtyard, it's the perfect escape from the hustle of Thamel. The menu offers a good mix of local Nepali dishes and international favorites. Everything I tried was fresh and well-prepared, and the prices are more than fair. The coffee and breakfast options, in particular, are top-notch.

Whether you're looking for a place to meet fellow travelers or just want a relaxing stay with good food, WanderThirst delivers on both fronts. Highly recommended!

Loved the atmosphere and service
The rooms could be better

Amazing Stay at Wander Thirst Hostel!
I had an incredible experience staying at Wander Thirst Hostel. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcome with their warm hospitality and friendly vibe.
The atmosphere is perfect for backpackers and solo travelers -- social, relaxed, and full of positive energy.Whether you're in Kathmandu for a short stay or a longer adventure, Wander Thirst Hostel is a top choice. Highly recommended!

Nice stay !
Really social vibe .
Clean

Recomande  !!

This hostel was fantastic. The twin private room was comfy - a little hot and stuffy but the fan did the job. Service was overall good, nice people. Only dropped down to a 4 on service due to attitude of staff when told to check with reception about included breakfast. We showed the booking details and also had it the previous day with no issues...but we still had to go and get reception to confirm again.
The place was great. The view upstairs stunning. Would stay there again. great place, great price. People are very kind

Wow! Great experience! The view from
The dorm is quite amazing! A bit noisy, but worth it! The staff is nice and the place clean!

The staff are so helpful and friendly. Super social, nice communal areas. Bed in private room is small, room not very soundproof. Trek prices seem more expensive here too, found somewhere a lot cheaper. But a good place to stay

I love this place. I stayed here before and after my trek and then a third time after a retreat I did here as well. The common area and restaurant are really beautiful and cozy and the food is also good. The staff here is super friendly, approachable and helpful as well. I had a private room and it was all very clean and the wifi works really well and overall I was super happy here. It's also a great place to either be on your own or meet lots of cool travelers from all over the world.

Meilleur hostel de Katmandou, le cadre avec des grands espaces exterieurs, l'ambiance agreable et conviviale, le staff toujours au top du top, la proprete, la nourriture, tout est parfait. Merci Giri et toute l'equipe

I really enjoyed this hostel and made it my home base before and after trekking. The common areas are really lovely and it's very easy to meet people. I stayed in a private room with a shared bathroom and everything was clean but the hot water doesn't always work for the shower. I liked the location a lot because it is a couple streets off of the main roads of Thamel so it's much more quiet and feels like a little break from the chaos but it's still very quick to get to everything. The vibes here are really good and the food is decent and cheap. The staff is also really nice, I recommend this hostel if you're looking for a chill but social place to stay while in Kathmandu.

It's a nice hostel with a perfect location, central but quiet.

I came here in January and it was a little bit cold since there's no heating but they provided thick blankets.
They had some construction so that made it a little noisy but it was communicated clearly.
Then I came back in April and there were way more people and it was a lot warmer. It's still clean and the people are very friendly.

It's quite a social hostel so if you want you can meet a lot of new friends which is nice. The breakfast is also good.

Thank you - namaste

I stayed here for 5 days, and it was a great experience overall. The rooftop had an incredible view of the city and sunset . Those who are looking hostel in cheap price and good quality Highly recommended..

Bon hostel, tres propre, chambre de qualite. Belles parties communes.

- j'ai paye une premiere fois 1500rp pour une chambre. Je reviens 2 jours apres, on me dit 2500rp. Je n'ai pas bien compris les raisons de cette augmentation soudaine, et suis donc allee voir ailleurs (les hostels ne manquent pas dans la zone).

Perfect base for our Nepal trip

For our two-week trip through Nepal in April, we used the hostel as a starting and ending point and spent a total of three nights there.

Excellent trip planning

The special thing about this hostel was the assistance in planning our trip. From the very first day, the owner helped us organize our entire trip and activities. Thanks to his expertise we could enjoy our time in Nepal to the fullest.

From sightseeing tours by motorbike in Kathmandu and Pokhara, to an exciting jungle safari in the Chitwan National Park and a four-day trek to the Mardi Himal View Point, to transfers, accommodations and meals - everything was planned in a professional and uncomplicated manner.

Unforgettable experiences

Another highlight was the last evening. Since it was quiet, we had dinner with the owner and then spent a traditional Nepalese evening in a bar. As a final highlight we went to a modern club in Thamel.

Conclusion

This hostel was not only a place to stay, but also a place that shaped our trip to Nepal. I will definitely stay here again at my next trip to Nepal - a clear recommendation!

Good room, but electricity and wifi were out for more than a day. Also, I received some wrong information from the staff about bus times that caused me to spend an extra day in Kathmandu. But they were apologetic and kind.

Najlepszy hostel w Katmandu, a nocowalam w kilku.. przestronne pokoje, goraca woda pod prysznicem, sporo przestrzeni wspolnej wewnatrz, a na zewnatrz restauracja z ogrodem, miejscami do lezenia i bardzo dobrym jedzeniem, polecam
Good room considering the price, and the restaurant in the hostel is very good and reasonably priced!
Loved this place! Very easy and staff super lovely. Great value for money! Even let us keep our bags for two weeks in their storage for free :)

Stayed here for one night and liked it so much we booked it again for two nights when we returned to the area a few days later. Perfect location for exploring Thamel, good breakfast and spacious private room with decent shared bathroom. Lovely outdoor seating area for breakfast / chilling out - a peaceful oasis after the busy streets of Kathmandu!

For the price, this place is outstanding. The roof dormitory is light, spacious and airy with views across Kathmandu. The cleanliness is exceptional, as is the WiFi. Hot water and free drinking water is also available. Would recommend 100%
Amazing hostel, very well located, amazing staff, great food, clean and spacious room! Great vibes in general - we have been there four times and really felt like home! Will be back there :)
Fantastic location and good atmosphere. Beds on the top floor have no blinds, so you are essentially waking up with the sun. However, you do get an awesome view of the city.

Ho trascorso 4 notti al WanderThirst Hostel e ne sono rimasta davvero soddisfatta, soprattutto considerando il prezzo super vantaggioso: solo 18 euro in totale per il soggiorno con colazione. Io avevo scelto il dormitorio con 8 posti letto e bagno in comune. Nonostante la scelta casuale, mi sono resa conto subito di aver fatto la scelta giusta perche c'e una vista mozzafiato sulla valle. Svegliarsi ogni mattina e godersi l'alba, il tramonto e la notte stellata sopra di voi questa l'esperienza incredibile che vi aspetta in questo ostello.
Tuttavia, di giorno il sole puo essere piuttosto forte e non ci sono tende, quindi meglio approfittarne per uscire e godersi la zona. Se preferite poi dormire completamente al buio vi consiglio di optare per un'altra opzione che offre l'ostello o munirvi di mascherina per coprire gli occhi.

Dormire in un dormitorio da 8 posti letto ha il vantaggio di permetterti di conoscere nuove persone. Nel mio caso, spesso, non tutti i letti erano occupati cosi e risultato anche meno affollato e piu piacevole. Le pulizie venivano fatte quotidianamente, e il personale e sempre stato molto gentile e disponibile. Anche se non ci sono armadietti grandi per riporre tutte le proprie cose, solo di piccoli, ho trovato l'ostello molto sicuro, quindi questo non e stato un problema.

Non c'e un'area per stendere i vestiti e non e consentito lavarli li, quindi se, come me, tornate da un trekking e avete bisogno di lavare qualcosa, ci sono diverse lavanderie nelle vicinanze. La colazione, inclusa nel soggiorno, offre tre opzioni e la possibilita di scegliere una bevanda, e l'ho trovata piuttosto buona.

Il punto forte e anche la posizione: l'ostello e centrale ma allo stesso tempo tranquillo, con diverse aree relax. E vicinissimo a negozi, ristoranti e altre comodita. Ho prenotato tramite Booking last minute (la mattina per la sera) e consiglio vivamente questo ostello a chi cerca un soggiorno economico ma con tutti i comfort essenziali.
6 nuits passees dans cet hostel tres propre et aux parties communes tres agreables. Top pour rencontrer du monde

If you are in the Thamel area of Kathmandu and seeking a vibrant, clean, and community-rich hostel, be sure to check out Wanderthirst. The hostel has some of the most impressive communal areas I've seen in the area, and it promotes a comfortable environment for travelers and nomads alike. I am very grateful to the front desk team for their helpfulness and attentiveness, and will be sure to stay here again when I return to Nepal. The coffee and bar area is well-priced and the staff is incredibly friendly. Don't miss this one, y'all! 10/10.

The coolest hostel I've ever met in Nepal is the cleanest, it's cleaned 4-5 times a day!!!! The administrator is always smiling and will always help in any matter! Everything is very convenient! Quiet and peaceful place! There is a roof for yoga classes!!! I highly recommend this place to everyone, you won't regret it!!!

The hostel offered plenty of amenities and was very affordable, especially for being in Thamel. However, it was located a bit too far inside the area, which made it slightly inconvenient at times. Despite that, the stay was comfortable, the staff were friendly, and it was easy to meet other travelers. For the price, it's a solid choice, especially if you want good views and tasty food and amenities.

Nepal was a bit out of my budget for me during my up t'il now 7 months of travel however the experience makes it all very much worth it.

Lord of the drinks, an international bar chain, is a popular night escape in Kathmandu valley. Situated amidst the hustle and bustle of the vibrant Thamel in Kathmandu, Lord of the drinks is gaining popularity as a premium night bar and club in Kathmandu. An interesting trio of drinks, food and amenities, nails the perfection of vigorous nightlife culture in Nepal.

As the dusk begins, the nightlife in Kathmandu starts. While the rest of Kathmandu is sleeping, Thamel stays awake. The enthralling ambience of Lord of the drinks itself is one of the supreme and highly honored clubbing fun in the valley.

The spacious setting, and the great musical choices, with highly professional amenities and services, Lord of drinks in Nepal has been serving in Nepal with the finest professionalism. The live music and the happenings in Lord of the drinks attract a lot of domestic and international tourists, making it a perfect night escape in Kathmandu valley. The lively and vivid atmosphere of Lord of the drinks is at its best. The mesmerizing settlement and internal ambience of this bar is perfect to lure anybody to make the night out with some head bangs and dancing parties.

BARC Rooftop Bar is an absolute gem! From the moment we walked in, the ambiance was on point -- relaxed yet classy, with cozy lighting and a fantastic view of the city skyline. The atmosphere is perfect whether you're out with friends, on a date, or just looking to unwind after a long day.

The food was excellent -- fresh, flavorful, and well-presented. Every dish we tried was delicious, especially the appetizers and grilled items. The drinks menu also has a great variety, and the cocktails were well-crafted.

Service was warm and attentive without being intrusive. The staff made sure we were comfortable throughout the evening.

If you're looking for a place with great food, a chill vibe, and a rooftop setting that makes the experience even better, BARC should definitely be on your list. Highly recommended!

Barc is phenomenal and I was genuinely impressed. The drinks are, of course, delicious. More than that, though, they are delicious drinks that draw on local ingredients and local food culture. I had the twist of Imli, an expert combination of coriander, lemongrass, and tamarind flavors. They also have drinks referencing local snacks or using local alcohol varieties. I had the Ayla sour, a great way to showcase their ayla in a cocktail. The hospitality is also top-notch and by innovative bartenders who know what they're doing. Thanks to Swadhin Raj Gurung and Sagar Bista for taking care of me.

My favorite bar in Kathmandu. Incredible cocktails (and very innovative cocktail menu), fab food  and outstanding service. Has indoor as well as outdoor section. Best cocktails in the valley. We particularly appreciated their swift and polite service, the ambience (enjoyed sitting on the patio and watching some local birds fly by), and their unique cocktails you can't find anywhere else! I had the Indian Summer which was briny, tangy, and refreshing; my partner had the Airy Khattu which (per him) tasted exactly like the khattu he had growing up. French fries hit as well. A true speakeasy; good luck finding the door.

A World-Class Gem in the Heart of Nepal 

BARC is nothing short of extraordinary! As a proud winner of the Top 50 Best Bars in Asia, this spot effortlessly lives up to its reputation. The cocktails are nothing less than masterpieces--crafted with precision, innovation, and a deep respect for the art of mixology. Each drink tells a story, balancing flavors so perfectly that you're left savoring every sip.

And then there's the food. Michelin-level bar bites that redefine what you thought was possible from a bar menu. Each dish is an explosion of flavors, expertly curated to pair with the drinks or stand alone as culinary works of art.

The ambiance? Impeccable. BARC combines a sophisticated, yet welcoming vibe with exceptional service that makes every visit unforgettable. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or just looking for a night out, this is the place to be.

Nepal has truly put itself on the map with this world-class destination. Highly recommend to anyone seeking a once-in-a-lifetime bar experience.

Terrible experience on a Friday night. They refused to serve everything we asked for because they apparently had sponsors and weren't serving anything except for one or two drinks allowed by the sponsor. They should have either not allowed guests without reservations or guests who didn't 'check their instagram' or provided 'limited menu'.
FYI, it wasn't even mentioned on their social media that they were serving limited drinks.

Barc offers a luxurious bar experience with its elegant decor, impeccable service, and innovative cocktails. The ambiance is a perfect blend of sophistication and comfort, enhanced by plush seating and an outdoor area. Their signature cocktails, like the "Berry Bubble, Bubble Bucha and Khattu" are as visually stunning as they are flavorful. Attentive staff ensure a personalized experience, while gourmet bites like momos with chili oil and cheesy fries elevate the evening. Though on the pricier side, it's worth every penny for a night of refined indulgence. Ideal for dates or intimate gatherings, reservations are a must.

I had the best experience here at Thamel Boutique Hotel. Walked in late in the night to change hotels, and was greeted by the very friendly Avishek Regmi. He gave us a great deal, and I even got a free upgrade due to low season. Never stopped saying hi and welcoming me whenever I go in and out of the hotel. 

The manager, Jayaram Adhikari, was extremely friendly as well, and walked me to a post office for some postage needs that I had. Loved the amenities, cleanliness, and facilities of the hotel.

The hotel is very close and walking distance to great spots to visit - LOD, Forest Plate, Himalayan Java Coffee, Paradise Spa, Everest Momo (next to Saraswati Multiple Campus), all my favourite spots whenever i'm back in Thamel!

10/10

My wife and I had an amazing stay at Thamel Boutique Hotel. The rooms were very clean and comfortable, and the bathroom had proper hot and cold water with all toiletries provided.

The rooftop restaurant was a highlight - we enjoyed delicious breakfast, lunch, and dinner with a beautiful view. The food was fresh, healthy, and full of flavor.

Location-wise, it's right in the center of Thamel but still peaceful inside. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay.

Highly recommended for couples or anyone looking for a clean, quiet, and well-located hotel in Kathmandu. We'd definitely stay here again!

Very good service by Avishek!
Recommend!
Best service
Overall experience was good. Manager and all staff were very cooperative and buffet breakfast was ausumn.
Everything is good , thanks Avishek regmi for good vibe and peaceful.

Best Hotel for stay. And Staff are very friendly

The food quality was pathetic . We ordered mutton curry and they served the worst ever mutton curry, uncooked, tasteless and total watery gravy. The worst part was that upon our request they did not even change nor correct the mistake. We left in hunger but the hotel manager charged full value with a very unapologetic manner.
Will recommend not to dine there.

A True Gem in Thamel - Thamel Boutique Hotel, Kathmandu

We keep coming back to Thamel Boutique Hotel, and for good reason - it's simply a place that feels like home.

This great hotel is located in a quiet corner of vibrant Thamel, and it is the perfect mix of Nepali charm and modern comfort in perfect location.

The rooms are clean, spacious & cozy, and beautifully designed.
The beds are big and comfortable and so is the bathroom, the hot water always works, Wi-Fi is strong, and everything is maintained to a high standard.

What truly makes this place special is the people & the service they give. Jaya ji, the manager, is one of the kindest and most generous people we've met. His presence and care are felt in every detail. And Sandeep from the dining area is a very very helpful devoted worker of this hotel, and we appreciate him a lot.

The location is ideal - close to everything, yet peaceful. The rooftop balcony  and restaurant is lovely for a quiet breakfast or evening tea. And by the way, the breakfast buffet is really yummy

Beyond being a great place to stay, this hotel is a lesson in thoughtful design, smooth management, and excellent maintenance. You can feel the love and intention in every corner.

We'll definitely keep returning - it's just the best place to stay in Kathmandu.

Dhanyavad
Excellent stay , food is delicious and location is amazing.

This spot was down the way from my hotel. The food was fantastic and the service was excellent. Nice spot outside with all the hustle and bustle of Kathmandu.

We visited this restaurant on the evening of November 14th, initially discovering it by chance on our way to another dining spot. Intrigued by the promise of an organic thali featuring Karnali Marsi rice and region-specific lentils, we decided to stop and give it a try. However, our high expectations quickly deflated. The thali included broiler chicken instead of the local chicken advertised on the menu. The vegetable offerings--pumpkin curry and vegetable pear--were quite ordinary, and the lentils served were the common pigeon pea variety, not the unique black bean lentils from Jumla as expected. These disappointments, along with several other concerns, made for a less-than-satisfactory experience.

During our recent visit to Kathmandu, we had the pleasure of dining at Karnali by Spize, and it turned out to be one of the most satisfying culinary experiences of our trip. Located in a cozy setting, this restaurant not only serves delicious food but also offers warm hospitality that makes you feel right at home.

Food Quality

The highlight of our meal was the Chicken Thali, which was absolutely delicious. The thali was well-balanced, offering a perfect blend of flavors that were both rich and comforting. Each component of the dish was thoughtfully prepared, from the tender chicken to the flavorful sides, making it a hearty and satisfying meal. We also tried the mid-fried momos, which were equally impressive. The momos had a perfect texture--crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside--with a filling that was seasoned to perfection. These dishes clearly demonstrated the restaurant's commitment to quality and authentic taste.

Ambiance and Hospitality

What truly set our experience apart was the exceptional hospitality provided by the two ladies who served us. Their warm and welcoming demeanor made us feel like we were dining at a friend's home rather than in a restaurant. They were attentive without being intrusive, ensuring that we had everything we needed and were comfortable throughout our meal. Their genuine care and friendliness added a personal touch to the dining experience, making it all the more memorable.

Overall Experience

Karnali by Spize is more than just a restaurant; it's a place where you can enjoy delicious food in a warm, home-like atmosphere. The combination of expertly prepared dishes and heartfelt hospitality makes it a standout dining spot in Kathmandu. Whether you're in the mood for a flavorful Chicken Thali, crave some tasty momos, or simply want to experience genuine Nepali hospitality, Karnali by Spize is the place to go. We left with full bellies and happy hearts, and we highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a truly enjoyable dining experience.
Everything we had was fantastic, and Sushila was so nice!!! Delicious and welcoming restaurant, we had kheema noodles, chicken momo, and thentuk fry. Definitely worth a visit!
Decent food, very friendly and charming staff, clean location, nice to sit on the terrace. We can definitely recommend this place.

Would definitely give 1000 star if possible

Karnali Organic Thali is a popular restaurant in Thamel that serves traditional Nepali Thali dishes made with organic ingredients. It is known for its delicious food, excellent service, and warm and inviting atmosphere.

The food here is delicious. The portions are generous and the prices are reasonable. The Thali dishes typically include a variety of dishes, such as dal bhat, tarkari, and achar. The dal bhat is a staple of Nepali cuisine and consists of rice, lentils, and vegetables. The tarkari is a variety of vegetable dishes, and the achar is a spicy pickle.

In addition to Thali dishes, they also serve a variety of other Nepali dishes, such as momos, chow mein, and Newari cuisine.

The ambience at Karnali Organic Thali is warm and inviting. The restaurant has a traditional Nepali decor with wooden furniture and colourful fabrics.

Items we had,
- Keema Noodles (buff) 275NPR
- Thenduk Fry (Buff) 295NPR
- Kothey Mo:Mo (Chicken) 275NPR
- Organic Chicken Thali 650NPR

The Keema noodles and Thenduk were noodles-based and were super. I cannot believe their price was so budget-friendly and the portions were amazing! Perfect for one person! The chicken momo was okay, we had better ones. The speciality of the Thali was it was made with all organic items. We enjoyed the Thali so much! The manager at work was very friendly! Hope you visit this place and get to meet her!

Very good rooms for the price and very excellent staff and atmosphere is good as well. The restaurant has very good options for food and all the staff is very friendly and great there as well. Highly recommended.

Zhe Li You Tai Mi Er Qu Yin Cang De Bao Cang,Ou Ran Ji Hui Lai Dao Lou Xia De Ka Pei Ting,Fa Xian Fen Wei Te Bie Hao,Fu Wu Ren Yuan De Tai Du Ye Hen Qin He,Hao Xiang Jin Ru Yi Pian Shi Wai Tao Yuan,Zan Shi Tao Chi Liao Cao Za He Ren Hai. Yi Wai Fa Xian Lou Shang Huan You Jiu Dian,Yu Shi Di Er Ci Lai Jiu Zai Zhe Li Zhu Liao Si Wan,Jie Guo Bi Xiang Xiang Zhong Geng Jia Liang Yan. Sui Ran Fang Jian She Shi Bi Jiao Pu Tong Lao Jiu,Dan Sheng Zai Gan Jing He An Jing,Wo Shui De Chu Qi De Hao.
